## Toast class

Class that allows for showing and dismissing temporary notifications.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Toast 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [createDom(workspace, options)](./blockly.toast_class.createdom_1_method.md) | <p><code>protected</code></p><p><code>static</code></p> | Creates the DOM representation of a toast. |
|  [hide(workspace, id)](./blockly.toast_class.hide_1_method.md) | <code>static</code> | Dismiss a toast, e.g. in response to a user action. |
|  [show(workspace, options)](./blockly.toast_class.show_1_method.md) | <code>static</code> | Shows a toast notification. |
